name: luster-purge
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Attacks with a burst of light. May lower SP. DEF.
flavor_text.emerald: Attacks with a burst of light. May lower SP. DEF.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A burst of light injures the foe. It may also lower the foe’s SP. DEF.
